description: Try our easy to follow Reindeer Chocolates recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chocolate treats,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Christmas,Egg free,Chocolate,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert
name: Reindeer Chocolates Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Using a 7cm round cookie cutter, trace 15 circles on paper.

Place melted milk choc melts in a piping bag fitted with a round nozzle. Pipe choc in rounds and using a small palate knife, smooth into circles. Carefully attach pretzels as ears and smarties as a nose. Leave to set for 10 minutes.

Place melted white choc melts in a piping bag fitted with a small round nozzle, using picture as a guide. Pipe choc eyes onto set rounds and attach dark choc bits. Leave to set for 10 minutes. Wrap in cellophane and give as gifts.
